title: the I-CAF Pop-Up Shop:  BLACK FRIDAY EDITION
desc: The   presents The Black Friday Holiday Pop & Shop November 27, 2015 at   from 11am-8pm I-CAF is community? of designers and artisans that support growth and sustainability in African Fashion.? The International-Coalition for African Fashion (I-CAF) will host a special edition pop-up shop featuring over 20 designers exhibiting hand made original and one of a kind fashion, apparel, accessories, home decor, and art all under one roof! Attendees will enjoy light refreshments and Cultural music by  .? This family friendly event will be one you won't want to miss.
